title: Sri Lankan Cabinet decides to resign; Mahinda Rajapaksa to remain as PM
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Cabinet of Ministers have decided to resign and have submitted their letters of resignation to Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa.
However, Rajapaksa will continue to function as the Prime Minister, said Dinesh Gunwardena who was the Minister of Education until today (3).
Sri Lankan Cabinet decides to resign; Mahinda Rajapaksa to remain as PM
(PICTURES) Massive protest in Wijerama; Students & local defy curfew order
